description: This is a Node.js script for performing health checks in CI/preview environments. It verifies the success of production builds, checks for missing environment variables, and ensures proper process exit codes to signal build status.

methods.name: warnMissingEnv
methods.description: Checks for missing recommended environment variables and logs warnings if any are absent.

methods.name: runBuild
methods.description: Runs the production build process using npm, handles process exit signals, and logs build success or failure messages.
